review: I've played this game for 7 years now. I need rehab
An Battle-Pass that underwhelming should at least provide the credits needed for the next season. Everything seems overpriced.

I defended Overwatch through all of its scandals, all the way until the release of Overwatch 2. They replaced all of the mechanics they could with payed versions. Overwatch has become an ode to the corporate greed.

i have like 2000 hours, its good :)

Cancelled PvE, unenjoyable PVP and a absolute monetization scam.
It is mindblowinghow Blizzard can make a new version of their game worse than the first.
And this is saying alot for a game that once had a loot box system and somehow the "less predatory" system that it has now is leagues and miles worse than the first.
Trully one of the Blizzard moments of all time.
As a (former) Blizzard Employee said it best, and what ironically describes one terrible thing about Blizzard:
"You think you do but you don't."
Overall, You're better off playing something else.
PS.: BTW, do you guys have phones?
